meanings.definition: a temporary position in a workplace, usually for students or recent graduates, to gain practical experience
meanings.sent1: During my internship, I learned a lot about the company.
meanings.sent2: She completed an internship at a local hospital last summer.
meanings.sent3: The internship was so fun, I almost forgot it was work!
meanings.sent4: Her internship was a stepping stone to her dream job.
meanings.sent5: The internship provided valuable hands-on training.

meanings.definition: the period of time during which someone works as an intern
meanings.sent1: His internship lasted for six months.
meanings.sent2: The internship ended with a presentation to the team.
meanings.sent3: The internship flew by in a blur of new experiences.
meanings.sent4: The internship felt like a journey of self-discovery.
meanings.sent5: The internship marked the beginning of her career.
